data.title: generasia
data.text:
S.K.I.N. is a Japanese rock super group consists of YOSHIKI of X JAPAN fame, GACKT, SUGIZO of LUNA SEA fame, Miyavi and JU-KEN of GacktJob.

Information

In August 2006, YOSHIKI announced at Otakon that he would start a band with GACKT. In December of the same year, it was reported that SUGIZO might be joining the group as the third member. Finally, on May 25, 2007, at the J-Rock Revolution festival in Los Angeles, S.K.I.N was eventually announced, including the previously discussed artists, as well as Miyavi. S.K.I.N will perform at the Anime Expo convention in Long Beach, California on June 29, 2007. On May 27 it was announced that a U.S. tour would start after the Anime Expo performance, followed by some performances in Japan in November. YOSHIKI confirmed that the group will release an album and that rough recordings of several songs were made in March 2007 but it was later cancelled. At Anime Expo, it was announced that JU-KEN, the bassist of GacktJob, will be the bassist for S.K.I.N..

Members

YOSHIKI (Drums, Piano)

Gackt (Vocals, Piano)

SUGIZO (Guitar, Violin)

Miyavi (Guitar, Shamisen)

JU-KEN (Bass)
